actividad.name: Hasta que te vuelva a tocar...

item.text: Until your next turn you must talk and move like a robot
Until your next turn everybody must call you sir
Until your next turn you must be shirtless
Until your next turn you must sit on the lap of the player you like the most
Until your next turn you must hold hands with the player the rest chooses
You mustn't speak until your next turn
You must speak in a different language until your next turn
Everybody must answer to you with 'Yes, sir'. If they forget they must drink a shot
